text:
#DYK? Canada participates in global vaccine R&D: In July 2020 Québec-based Medicago 🇨🇦 launched phase 1  trials on a plant-based #COVID19 #vaccine. Phase 3 trials began on 16 March with regulatory approvals expected to be sought later this year. 
Another global vaccine candidate. https://t.co/yP9qhuEucs
